    • registerBibliographicProduct

      public boolean registerBibliographicProduct(String id, String name, int pagesNumber, int genre, int day, int month, int year, int productType, String review, String url, double value, double suscriptionValue, String periodicEmision)
      This method register a new bibliographic product, can be Book or Magazine
      Parameters:
      id - int identifier of the product
      name - String name of the product
      pagesNumber - int amount of pages of a product
      genre - int genre of the book
      day - int day of publication
      month - int day of publication
      year - int day of publication
      productType - int indicates the type of product to register
      review - String review of the book
      url - String link of the caratule of the product
      value - double value of the book
      suscription - double value of the suscription of a magazine
      periodicEmision - String indicates the emision of the magazine
      Returns:
      boolean

      newInfo - string new information that replaces the old one

      day - int day of buy
